content.para: The 3.6.1 release introduces minor bug fixes.

tr.td: Support for extra parameters in SolrDocumentSource

td.p: The syntax of serviceUrlBase is relaxed to allow extra parameters to be passed to SolrDocumentSource.

tr.td: The web application demo could reveal Bing APPID.

td.p: The web application demo could reveal Bing APPID which is no longer free of charge.

content.p: For a complete list of improvements and bug fixes, see JIRA issues fixed in version 3.6.1.
